name: Carne Asada Marinade
description: Bittercube Bitters are great way to enhance your cooking. Use them in marinades, dressings, soups & chilis, baking and more!
ingredients: garlic cloves, minced,chipotle pepper in adobo sauce, minced,bunch fresh cilantro, chopped,dried oregano,chili powder,ground cumin,smoked paprika,salt,black pepper,Bittercube Corazón Bitters,Bittercube Orange Bitters,lime, juiced,orange, juiced,vinegar,soy sauce,canola oil,flank or skirt steak
instructions: In a gallon size resealable bag, combine all marinade ingredients. Squeeze it around to mix it up.Put the whole steak into the bag. Seal it up tight. Make sure all of the meat is exposed to the marinade, squishing the bag around to coat meat. Refrigerate at least 2 hours, or overnight.Heat grill to high heat. Remove steak from marinade. Cock on hot grill for 3-4 minutes a side for medium-rare.Remove from heat and let rest a few minutes before slicing.

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with afluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.Adjustment: Swap simple syrup for raspberry syrup for a unique twist.

instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Green Isaac’s Special
ingredients: Twisted Path Gin,Demerara syrup,Coconut water,Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
garnish: Cocktail umbrella dripped with Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients in a cocktail glass and half-fill with crushed ice. Immerse a swizzle stick, place the stick between the palms of both hands and rotate rapidly by sliding your hands back and forth against it. If you don’t have a swizzle stick, use a bar spoon in the same manner. Top with more crushed ice.

instructions: Temper glass mug with hot water.  Combine ingredients in glass mug and stir lightly.Adjustments: Instead of hot water use your favorite hot tea.

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Jack Rose

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.Adjustment: Swap Apple Brandy for Rujero Singani for a lighter, floral twist.

name: Jackson Pollock
description: Nick created this cocktail for the 2nd Bombay Sapphire Cocktail Competition in Minneapolis circa 2007. Although the cocktail is a winner, Nick went home empty handed that year.
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Fresh grapefruit juice,Simple syrup,Bombay Sapphire Gin,Sparkling wine,Bittercube Jamaican No.2 Bitters
garnish: 6 drops of basil oil, 6 drops of paprika oil
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except sparkling wine to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake briefly with a fluid, strong motion. Add sparkling wine to shaker and strain into glass.

name: Jerk Chicken Marinade
ingredients: onion, roughly chopped,green onions, roughly chopped,garlic cloves, peeled,scotch bonnet peppers or jalapeno,soy sauce,lime, juiced,white vinegar,packed brown sugar,ground allspice,ground cloves,ground cinnamon,dried thyme,Bittercube Jamaican No.1 Bitters,Bittercube Jamaican No.2 Bitters,Salt & pepper, to taste,chicken legs or thighs
instructions: Place all ingredients, except chicken, in a blender or food processor. Blend until smooth in consistency.Put chicken in a large bowl or shallow dish. Add marinade and toss chicken to coat. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate for a least 4 hours, or overnight.Oven + grill method:Preheat the oven to 350°F. Transfer chicken to a foil-lined baking sheet and bake for 35 minutes. Build a medium hot fire in a charcoal grill, or heat a gas grill to medium. Place chicken, skin side down and cook until the marinade forms a crust on the outside; 4-6 minutes. Turn chicken and cover grill. Grill until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F. While the chicken is finishing on the grill, take any remaining marinade and bring to a boil. Reduce to make a sauce.Grill method:Build a medium hot fire in a charcoal grill, or heat a gas grill to medium. Add chicken, skin side down until the marinade forms a crust on the outside; 6-8 minutes. Turn, over grill and continue cooking until cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F, about 40 minutes. Turning as needed to prevent burning.

name: La Femme Rouge
ingredients: Heavy cream,Simple syrup,1912 Amerique Absinthe Rouge,Pierre Ferrand Dry Curacao,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Long shake, dump, dirty ice, garnish.

name: La Vicuña

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Labradoodle
ingredients: Heavy cream,2:1 Demerara syrup,Cacao Butter Washed Old Forester 100 Proof,Rujero Singani,Bittercube Marvel Bitters,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
glass: Etched rocks filled with crushed ice
garnish: Grated nutmeg and a Filthy Red Cherry
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.For Cacao Butter washed Old Forester 100Melt 250g of non-deodorized cacao butter at a low heat and blend into 750ml of Old Forester 100 Proof Whiskey and let stand in a glass jar for one hour. Once the oil has floated to the top, place the jar in the freezer. Once the the cacao butter has frozen solid, poke a few holes through the layer of butter, pour the liquid through a coffee filter and re-bottle for use.

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.For Rosemary infused Bittercube Orange BittersCombine 2 g of rosemary leaves (stripped from the branch) and a 1 oz bottle of Bittercube Orange Bitters in a glass container and macerate for 48 hours. Filter infusion through a tea strainer and re-bottle into eyedropper.

name: Orange Vinaigrette
description: Bittercube Bitters are great way to enhance your cooking. Use them in marinades, dressings, soups & chilis, baking and more!
ingredients: olive oil,white wine vinegar,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Put all ingredients in a bowl and whisk to incorporate. Mix in any additional ingredients (see suggestions below) and then lightly toss with salad.Serving recommendations and variations:Mix in fresh chopped herbs like basil or thymeAdd poppy seedsAdd honey to balance the acidity from the vinegarUse different Bittercube Bitters for a different flavor profile!This vinaigrette is delicious with fruit. Chop apples, pears, or throw in some blueberries or blackberries

instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.Try this cocktail any number of ways, perfect, double reverse perfect or without any dry vermouth.

ingredients: Cucumber slice,Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Bombay Sapphire Gin,Pimm's No.1 Cup,Seltzer,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker, muddle the cucumber slice and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: Coco Lopez Coconut Cream,Heavy Cream,Fresh pineapple juice,Don Q Blanco,Heirloom Pineapple Amaro,Bittercube Jamaican No.1 Bitters,Crushed ice
garnish: Mint sprig and a pineapple and cherry skewer
instructions: Combine ingredients in a blender and blend until ice is pulverized. Pour into glass and top with crushed ice.

name: Pineapple Amaro Sour
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Heirloom Pineapple Amaro
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Pisco Sour
ingredients: Egg white,Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Barsol Quebranta Pisco,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Strain and remove ice. Return drink to cocktail shaker and shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
ingredients: Egg white,Heavy cream,Fresh lemon juice,Fresh lime juice,Simple syrup,Broker's Gin,Seltzer,Orange flower water,Bittercube Trinity Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Strain and remove ice. Return drink to cocktail shaker and shake with a fluid, strong motion. Strain cocktail into glass and add seltzer.

name: Red Hook
ingredients: Redemption Rye Whiskey,Punt e Mes,Luxardo Maraschino,Bittercube Trinity Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Remember the Maine
ingredients: Knob Creek Rye Whiskey,Cocchi Vermouth di Torino,Cherry Heering,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
glass: Rocks rinsed with Amerique 1912 Absinthe Verte
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass. Dump seasoned rocks out of glass while rolling glass and strain cocktail into glass. Garnish.

name: Rob Roy
ingredients: Glenlivet Founder's Reserve Scotch Whisky,Cocchi di Torino Sweet Vermouth,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Rocket Squirrel
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Demerara syrup,Rujero Singani,Frangelico,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
glass: Hurricane or double rocks with crushed ice
garnish: Lime wheel, grated nutmeg and cocktail umbrella
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass and fill with crushed ice.

name: Royal Hawaiian
ingredients: Fresh pineapple juice,Fresh lemon juice,Almond syrup,Lawless Greenway Gin,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
garnish: Edible micro orchids or a Filthy Red Cherry
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sazerac
ingredients: Demerara syrup,Willett Family Estate 3 Year Rye Whiskey,Bittercube Marvel Bar Bitters,Bittercube Orange Bitters
glass: Rocks glass rinsed with Amerique 1912 Absinthe Verte
garnish: Lemon peel expressed over glass and discarded
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into rinsed glass.

name: Scotch Old Fashioned
ingredients: Honey Syrup,The Glenlivet Founder's Reserve Single Malt Scotch Whisky,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters,Bittercube Orange Bitters
glass: Rocks with large chunk of ice
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sidecar
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Copper & Kings American Brandy,Pierre Ferrand Dry Curacao,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Silk Sheets
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Mezcal,Cognac,Heirloom Alchermes,Bittercube Orange Bitters
garnish: Orange peel expressed and discarded. Serve with French burnt peanuts
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Singapore Sling
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Fresh pineapple juice,Grenadine,Broker's Gin,Cherry Heering,Benedictine,Pierre Ferrand Dry Curacao,Bittercube Trinity Bitters
garnish: Pineapple chunk, Filthy Red Cherry and cocktail umbrella
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass. Fill with crushed ice.

name: Six Corner Sling
description: This drink is a riff on the Bittered Gin Sling found in Eric Felton’s 'How’s Your Drink?'. This is one of the first cocktail's Ira was really proud of and is still a Bittercube favorite.
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Old Overholt Rye Whiskey,Punt e Mes,Seltzer,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters,Bittercube Orange Bitters
glass: Green Chartreuse rinsed Collins with ice
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into rinsed collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Sling of Sorts
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Gamle Ode Dill Aquavit,Ruby Port Wine,Seltzer,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Sling
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Jim Beam Prohibition Rye Whiskey,Cocchi Vermouth di Torino,Seltzer,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Smoke & Stormy
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Simple syrup,Knob Creek Bourbon,Top Note Ginger Beer,Bittercube Corazon Bitters,Cocktail Cedar
instructions: Ignite a Bittercube cocktail cedar stick and fill the glass with the smoke. Place glass on table/bar inverted.Add all of the ingredients except ginger beer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add ginger beer to shaker and strain into smoked collins glass. Fill with ice.

name: Smoky LaFlare
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Fresh grapefruit juice,Demerara syrup,Peaty Scotch,Heirloom Creme de Flora,Seltzer,Bittercube Corazón Bitters,
garnish: Grapefruit peel expressed and inserted, edible flowers
instructions: Add ice to wine glass and set aside to chill. Meanwhile, add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Remove ice from wine glass, add seltzer to shaker and strain into wine glass and garnish. Fill glass with ice.

name: Stinger
ingredients: Fresh mint leaves,Simple syrup,Cognac,Heirloom Genepy,Bittercube Orange Bitters,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
instructions: Draw mint leaves up the sides of the glass with a bar spoon being cautious not to over muddle. Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Strawberry Manhattan
ingredients: Strawberry infused Copper and Kings American Brandy,Cocchi Vermouth di Torino,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Sweet Life by Frank Ocean
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Mango-Peach syrup,Bombay Sapphire Gin,Sparkling wine,Bittercube Jamaican No.2 Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except sparkling wine to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake briefly with a fluid, strong motion. Add sparkling wine to shaker and strain into glass.

name: The Bluejay
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Fresh grapefruit juice,Simple syrup,Fidencio Classico Mezcal,Bittercube Jamaican No.2 Bitters,Light Mexican Lager
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except beer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add beer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: The Fall of ‘75
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Allspice syrup,Norseman Strawberry Rhubarb Gin,Sparkling wine,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except sparkling wine to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake briefly with a fluid, strong motion. Add sparkling wine to shaker and strain into glass.

name: The Fall of Temperance
description: Created during the Speakeasy pop-up days at Bryant’s in Milwaukee, the Fall of Temperance is a daiquiri with a blend of two rums and a punch of bitters to the face.
ingredients: Fresh lime juice,Simple syrup,Plantation 3 Stars Rum,Cruzan Blackstrap Rum,Bittercube Jamaican No.1 Bitters,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: The Giant Killer
ingredients: Egg white,Fresh lemon juice,Herbs De Provence syrup,Bombay Sapphire East Gin,Green Chartreuse,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
garnish: Swirled Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters & thyme sprig
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Strain and remove ice. Return drink to cocktail shaker and shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: The Iroquois
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Demerara syrup,Bourbon,Heirloom Creme de Flora,Birch extract,
instructions: Rinse glass with 1/8 oz Creme de Flora. Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion and strain into cocktail glass.

name: The Old Fashioned
ingredients: Demerara syrup,Willett Family Estate Bourbon,Bittercube Trinity Bitters
glass: Rocks with large chunk of ice
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.Adjustment: Try a different spirit or combination of spirits. Demerara is best with brown spirits and simple syrup is recommended for clear spirits.

name: The Scarlet Pimpernel
ingredients: Copper & Kings Apple Brandy,Pear Williams Purkhart Eau de Vie,Cocchi Americano Rosa,Luxardo Maraschino,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Tom Collins
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Broker's Gin,Seltzer,Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Toronto
ingredients: Demerara syrup,Willett 3 Year Rye Whiskey,Fernet Branca,Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Untitled, Unmastered: Track 2
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Simple syrup,Gamle Ode Dill Aquavit,Cynar,Fentiman's Ginger Beer,Bittercube Jamaican No.1 Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except ginger beer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add ginger beer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.

name: Vesper Sparrow
ingredients: Modest Vodka,London Dry Gin,Cocchi Americano,Heirloom Creme de Flora,Bittercube Jamaican No.2 Bitters,
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Vesper
ingredients: Broker's Gin,Modest Vodka,Cocchi Americano,Bittercube Orange Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Vieux Carre
ingredients: Redemption Rye Whiskey,Pierre Ferrand Cognac,Cocchi Vermouth di Torino,Benedictine,Bittercube Trinity Bitters,Bittercube Marvel Bar Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients to a stirring vessel and then fill with ice. Stir with a bar spoon until chilled and strain into cocktail glass.

name: Vodka Martini
ingredients: Modest Vodka,Bittercube Orange Bitters
garnish: 3 Filthy Olives or a lemon twist
instructions: Shake ingredients vigorously, do not double strain.

name: Wisco Old Fashioned
ingredients: Filthy Black Cherry,Orange slice,Demerara syrup,Korbel Brandy,Sprite,Bittercube Bolivar Bitters,Bittercube Orange Bitters,Bittercube Blackstrap Bitters
garnish: Cherry and orange slice on toothpick
instructions: Add ingredients except Sprite to glass, muddle orange and cherry, add ice and stir to combine. Top with Sprite and ice.

name: Yamato Sling
ingredients: Fresh lemon juice,Green Tea Honey syrup,Sake,Bombay Sapphire East,Seltzer,Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
garnish: Pineapple frond sprinkled with a dash of Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters
instructions: Add all of the ingredients except seltzer to a cocktail shaker and then fill with ice. Shake with a fluid, strong motion. Add seltzer to shaker and strain into collins glass. Fill glass with ice.
